TABLE.NAME: local_fd_student_due_dates
TABLE.COMMENT: due dates for individual students on assigned grade_items

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of user from user table

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: due date of an individual grade_item for the user

KEY.NAME: uniqueduedate
KEY.COMMENT: ensure that there is only one gradeitem per user

TABLE.NAME: local_fd_trackcourse
TABLE.COMMENT: Boolean to determine whether or not a course should display a report for flexdates

FIELD.NAME: track
FIELD.COMMENT: to track or not to track, that is the question

KEY.NAME: uniquecourseid
KEY.COMMENT: ensure that there is only one record per course
